member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION structure contains information on the state of virtual resolution support for the monitor.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION.header
member.summary: A structure that holds information on the type, size, adapterID, and ID of the target the monitor is connected to.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.disableMonitorVirtualResolution
member.summary: Setting this bit disables virtual mode for the monitor using information found in header.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.reserved
member.summary: Reserved for system use. Do not use in your driver.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SUPPORT_VIRTUAL_RESOLUTION.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.value
member.summary: Reflects the value of disableMonitorVirtualResolution in cases where debugging is utilized.
